alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 20 at 2:32AM MST until February 20 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Oakesdale, Tekoa, Plummer, Uniontown, La Crosse, Rosalia, Pullman, Colfax, Genesee, Potlatch, and Moscow. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 10 AM PST this morning. For the High Wind Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles on north-south roads including Highway 195.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.
